website_summaries.verdict: 4-ply tire at an unbeatable price that will meet expectations.
pros: Expect a sturdy product at a very attractive price
Reviews point to the strong traction and overall quality of product and performance

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TRACTION  AND PRICE !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great tires !! Especially for the price paid...I put them on a commercial walk behind mower for better traction, and boy do they work well !!! They are Not easy on the grass/ yard , but I Don't Care about that...the mower weighs 500# and I don't want to be pulling or pushing it around, I just want it to GO !!! So far they show no wear/damage of any kind... I'm Very Happy with them !!!!
customer_reviews.author: D.R.L.

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement tires.
customer_reviews.text: These tires work great on my Troy built sicklebar mower. I found them difficult to install so after working with it for a short time, I took them to a tire dealer and they installed it.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Clifton Tribble

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a quality tire
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a quality tire. However, it is noticeably narrower than the Carlisle it was bought to replace on my tiller. I'm not a tire expert, but I was under the impression that as long as the numbers on the sidewalk match, the tire would be the right size. Since it's just for my garden,and seems to hold air for a low price, I'm giving it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: bridges9129

customer_reviews.title: So far, very durable
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than expected. The measurents must be when at Max inflation at it's highest and widest measurement. Either way, they still worked good.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Just what we needed for the rototiller. Couldn't find them anywhere locally and the price was better here.
customer_reviews.author: Constance S Klagge

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and stiff - will last a long time!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tire. Works well and I expect it to last! Will order the same if the other tire needs replacing!
customer_reviews.author: chefmichael

customer_reviews.title: ... my Pride Wrangler mobility scooter and the traction is excellent. If I had just a bit more power
customer_reviews.text: I put these on my Pride Wrangler mobility scooter and the traction is excellent. If I had just a bit more power, they would work on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: KVP

customer_reviews.title: Great traction
customer_reviews.text: It provided great traction over the OEM tires that came with the riding lawn mower
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Good tires for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Good set of tires for the money but the lugs/tread aren't as tall as the tires I replaced.
customer_reviews.author: bluetickjr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tiller tire and great price.
customer_reviews.text: I used this for an old tiller I have and it worked great. It's a tough tire, was not too bad too put on the rim (just have plenty of dish soap available and a couple of flat screw drivers for prying) Also don't forget to get a new valve stem for these!
customer_reviews.author: DigitalAlien

customer_reviews.title: Just the tire
customer_reviews.text: Hardest part was finding someone to mount the tire on the rim. I use them on my rototiller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All good and functional
customer_reviews.text: Just what I would expect from agriculture tire, sturdy but still easy to mount, and effective. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Ray Huckins

customer_reviews.title: rototiller tire
customer_reviews.text: great tire, better than the original, As with any small tire they are a little harder to mount on a rim. Still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed to fix up my old tiller.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality tire for the money. Tough to change though
customer_reviews.author: The junkman

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Used these on a snowking snowblower. Excellent tire for my application, however extremely difficult to install due to rim size and extra heavy side walls of the tire. I Am very pleased with the final product though
customer_reviews.author: Francis B.

customer_reviews.title: thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Great price, they installed, inflated and work as they should
customer_reviews.author: Mike T

customer_reviews.title: Fieldmaster Traction Lug 13x5.00-6 Tire (4 Ply)
customer_reviews.text: VERY GOOD wagon tires, live in the desert, EVERYTHING HAS A THORNS!!!
customer_reviews.author: TOM WILSON

customer_reviews.title: If you can get them on.......
customer_reviews.text: If you can get them on the rim. Sidewall is so hard can't even get them on the rim.
customer_reviews.author: Charles V Clark

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: did what it was intended for good heavy duty tire
customer_reviews.author: bill hadley

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement tire for my rototiller
customer_reviews.text: A nearly identical replacement for my older super bronco tiller (21A-634B063).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect match for the tire I need to replace. Priced right.
customer_reviews.author: William A Peiffer

customer_reviews.title: Work as expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy tires. Used to replace go kart tires.
customer_reviews.author: Iceman

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Aggressive looking tires I bought for the kid's ATV. I was not able to install them myself, had to go to the local tire shop. Good product none the less.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

product_meta.title: Fieldmaster Traction Lug 13x5.00-6 Tire (4 Ply)
feature_bullets: Perfect for snowblower, trencher, and other lawn/garden/tractor applications.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars79 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
